title: Highcharts font from the logo
content:
It's the logo from Highcharts , [www.highcharts.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317073843/http:/www.highcharts.com/ "www.highcharts.com") , It was created using SVG

[http://www.highcharts.com/templates/highsoft\_colorful/images/logo.svg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317073843/http:/www.highcharts.com/templates/highsoft_colorful/images/logo.svg "http://www.highcharts.com/templates/highsoft\_colorful/images/logo.svg")

Any ideas?

Thank you

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317073843im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font_3416.jpg)

Font: 

 Estilo 

Solved By: 

 [donshottype](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317073843/http:/typophile.com/user/205259 "View user profile.")
author: saulob

comments.content:
This is the lowercase of Estilo with Greek alpha used as \_a\_

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317073843im_/http:/typophile.com/files/EstiloLCwithAlpha_6019.jpg)
  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/dstype/estilo/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317073843/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/dstype/estilo/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/dstype/estilo/")  
Don
Or with the superscript feature activated.
